page.title: 11CUSTOMS
page.content: Knighton Fair Day The fair is an annual event and because of an old charter in the town it is always there on May 19th.It is a place to go where you can enjoy yourself,and meet people you don't see very often.It is very expensive and some people think it is a waste of money.Rides on the fair used to be very reasonable a few years ago.There are all sorts of rides.For little children there are rides like the aeroplane,and for the older ones the bumper cars,the cyclone, twist, the cage and the scream machine.There are lots of side shows and games too.You can win prizes on the side shows but they are not very good. It is lovely to have a hotdog or toffee apple or even chips to go home with.
